info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 1:47PM CDT until April 22 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield MO
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...
Roubidoux Creek Near Waynesville affecting Pulaski County.
Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County.
Gasconade River at Jerome affecting Phelps County.
For the Roubidoux Creek...including Waynesville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Big Piney River...including Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate... Minor flooding is forecast. For the Gasconade River...including Jerome...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate.
* WHEN...Until late Tuesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, the Happy Hollow Picnic Area floods.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 8.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:00 PM CDT Sunday was 8.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 8.4 feet this evening. It will then rise to 9.0 feet this evening. It will fall to 8.1 feet tomorrow morning. It will then rise to 9.2 feet tomorrow evening. It will fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.1 feet on 06/05/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued Monday afternoon at 200 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY MORNING
